long_description: Clip the Omron USB Tri-Axis pedometer to your waist and starting walking! The pedometer collects data about your daily activity, which can be uploaded to OmronFitness.com to be analyzed. Tri-axis technology counts steps accurately and quietly whether the pedometer is positioned flat, vertically or horizontally so you can carry it where it is most comfortable. Connect the pedometer to a USB port on your computer to upload your data to OmronFitness.com, where you can track results and share victories. Mac and PC compatible. Pedometer not only tracks steps and distance, but also calories burned and aerobic "brisk" steps. Store up to 7 days of information on the display for easy viewing; download up to 22 days of information from the pedometer to your computer. Automatic reset wipes the daily tracker clean at midnight, allowing you to easily count your daily steps and distance. The Omron USB Tri-Axis pedometer includes a holder with a clip for wearing the pedometer.
short_description: Clip the Omron USB Tri-Axis pedometer to your waist and starting walking! The pedometer collects data about your daily activity, which can be uploaded to OmronFitness.com to be analyzed.
